name: Intrusion (RedWool, Mustan)
description:
Steal the secrets of corrupted and cursed bosses by going inside their bullets and give them a taste of their own medicine!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Left Shift - Slow Mode

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Weakening Laser

U - Skip Boss (If a boss is giving you trouble)

Credits:

Programming + Music: Leo Lui

Support: Kevin Wang

Artist: Bruce Lee

Background Art: Athena Lui
